item.description:
A CAUSE FOR CELEBRATION - MLR MGT One Year Anniversary Party!

MLR Artist Management cordially invites you to celebrate our one year anniversary to benefit Hearts of Gold charity. Hearts of Gold, since 2001, has continued to support and give to homeless women & children the essentials needed to sustain productive lives. Day in and day out MLR has the opportunity to dress, beautify, and photograph some of the most amazing individuals in our community. It is humbling to see how much MLR has grown over the past year, which is why we would like to invite you to help us give back while celebrating such a significant milestone in our history as a business.

Donations will go on to benefit homeless women and children. We are asking all our attendees to take a look into their closet to search for a coat, jacket, or any clothing item that you have not worn in a while to donate to those who are in need of one this winter. We will be collecting donations at the door. Please make sure donations are clean and in good condition.

To help you get to the event in style, our partner Uber is offering $25 off the town car ride by using the code "Cause4Celebration". Head into the app on your smartphone, click on account, then promotions, and enter the code. Once applied, your ride will be free to event!

Please join us for a night of cocktails, music, dessert, silent auction, & a live fashion exhibit.

Silent Auction Items Include:

  • Round Trip airfare on Virgin America for one, including ground transport provided by Uber
  • Photoshoot (4 hours - including hair, makeup, and 3 retouched photos) provided by MLR
  • Men's & Women's Haircut at Station 34 in Brookline
  • Personal Shopper with stylist Victoria Vegas (includes consultation & 2 hours of shopping)
  • Makeup Consultation (up to 5 people) provided by MLR
  • Acrylic Painting, by Noel McKinnon
  • Desinger Gown, by Ashely Rose
  • Gift Basket of Lush cosmetics
  • Gift Basket of Chocolate provided by Max Brenner
  • More to come..

THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 15, 2012 from 7:00-10:00 PM | Bar 10 at the Westin Hotel | 10 HUNTINGTON AVENUE, BOSTON, MA

Dress Fashionably

Your support is much appreciated!

http://www.eventbrite.com/event/4596907474/efblike?fb_action_ids=50335607301579
item.name: FREE TOMORROW NIGHT - Fashion,fundraising & networking at MLR Anniversary Party!
